html:
10.14.17  3:56 pm   can i trust myself

     probably

10.14.17  3:19 pm   Can I donate you a bunch of cotton balls

     i already have way too many

10.14.17  1:55 pm   what's your twist on the phrase "not my cup of tea"?

     i actually say "not my cup of tea", because for me, saying it that way is a twist. i can't explain why because that would result in too much hate mail

10.14.17  1:54 pm   what's the fourth word in your new song?

     enough

10.14.17  1:48 pm   where is the moon 

     20leo

10.14.17  1:32 pm   How do you use a keyboard

     press the buttons, according to which notes you want

10.14.17  1:31 pm   Are bees real?

     i think so

10.14.17  12:36 pm   I'm trying to find that balance between changing the world and enjoying the world, you feel me?

     yes

10.14.17  11:36 am   what is pablao on the what is love video?

     i think it was a brand of cereal. but you will have to check the video, i haven't seen it in a while

10.14.17  10:37 am   many people speculate that your songs have deep and depressing meanings and are a cry for help. is that true?

     no

      are you alright?

     are you

10.14.17  9:29 am   hey, i want to write a minor waltz, any scale suggestions?

     use the notes 1, 2, flat3, 4, and 5. beyond that there are quite a few different possibilities, on a moment to moment basis

10.14.17  9:23 am   will we ever see more on your jazz page

     yes

10.14.17  8:53 am    does the soul determine what happens to it, or does what happens determine the soul. Like in the case of 10.13.17  3:44 pm would anything change in that parallel universe, because his soul reacts differently to your situation, or would your situation cause him to react the same way as you. 

     every universe is available

10.14.17  6:52 am   In the song "outside" did you get the alien part from real life experience?

     no

10.14.17  6:28 am   what's the difference between grape juice and wine ?

     you annual household income

10.14.17  6:18 am   Are you illiterate

     no

10.14.17  6:10 am   do i look fat in this dress

     you will have to decide for yourself

10.14.17  4:11 am   why does a keyboard have no keys, nor locks?

     it does have keys. why would it have locks

10.14.17  3:39 am   Will you come to Youtube fanfest

     i've never heard of it

10.14.17  2:11 am   do you know what your next thing is yet?

     yes

      because I do.

10.14.17  1:35 am   Is there any reason why you only did a history of Japan and then a History of the entire world? i'm not angry or anything, i just want to know.

     well, those take a long long time to make, and many many weeks and months of hard work. i guess my question to you would be how many have you done, and why haven't you done more than you've done?

10.14.17  1:15 am   who's the definitive best Power Ranger

     you

10.14.17  1:12 am   can i just ask like a bunch of different questions

     i will check with the rules and regulations

10.14.17  12:05 am   long time no see. 

     well why dont you stop by

10.13.17  10:54 pm   why do you choose to make unconventional music? 

     i choose to follow some conventions, sometimes. and also not follow them sometimes. i think that's a good reasonable balance

10.13.17  10:46 pm   Opinions on social media?

     i think it's off to a great start

10.13.17  10:07 pm   what do you think about the holocene calendar

     seems legit

10.13.17  9:39 pm   Do you trust your memory?

     yes

10.13.17  9:13 pm   Do you like sloths?

     they're ok

10.13.17  9:11 pm   I saw that you answered some questions about the purpose or meaning of human existence. You answered that it was for humans to see what we are capable of. I think its a weird question to ask because, why would there be a purpose or meaning? I know some people need to have a sense of meaning to not feel completely helpless. But its like asking: " what is the meaning of turtle existence?". I would say there is none. So why should it be different for humans?

     i think the answer you saw is the same answer i would say for turtles as well

10.13.17  7:55 pm   when did you think up the idea about doing soap tips?

     probably on friday, sep 29

10.13.17  7:49 pm   Do you ever herd sheep?

     no

10.13.17  7:34 pm   Is breast milk vegan?

     probably not

10.13.17  7:17 pm   why do you like to purposely misspell most of your website titles or something like that (is it supposed to be a mistake)

     graphics free title graphics

10.13.17  7:07 pm   Person who asked you abt if you like making the visuals for your songs/why you do them; I hope it's not too bothersome for you and I assumed this was the reason because I guess people tend to keep their interest on something when there are multiple sensory stimulations. do you releae your songs on the website  first and how much after do they get released on spotify ? thanks for creating and sharing. makes my life a little better 

     when releasing a new song/video, i try to release it at the exact same time everywhere. but unfortunately with the music stores don't allow me to set a release time. only a date

10.13.17  6:36 pm   how to know how to end a song?

     you get to do it however you want

10.13.17  5:44 pm   Hello Bill. We would like to offer you a record contract. You will receive .05 cents for every dollar of profit.

     oh nice, i'm gonna be rich

     (However, proceeds from using your music in commercials will go entirely to the label, which will maintain full rights and ownership of your music). You can have full creative freedom, under the condition that we can produce and remaster the recordings as we see fit. We also reserve the right to determine which songs are released and which songs are not, and we ask that your lyrics do not include any profane language or controversial subject matter. Please have your manager contact us, so we can fire him and replace him with somebody from our label.

10.13.17  5:38 pm   Where can I acquire musicianship?

     absolutely anywhere

10.13.17  5:37 pm   quick history reminder: looking at your videos page i notice there's a 4 month run from august to december 2015 where you posted a video every day, starting with "self image" and the three Oh Shit I'm Out Of Videos videos. how did you start on the daily release schedule after you ran out of videos?

     that was the point where i ran out of daily uploads for vine. because i had been uploading my entire video catalog to vine, 1 per day, while only actually making new videos twice a week. so eventually i ran out. so that meant if i wanted to keep the daily vines going it meant i would need to make new ones every day

10.13.17  5:34 pm   Why don't I ever write songs in F major? 

     i don't know

10.13.17  5:28 pm   "oh no, it's a natural disaster" what inspired you to include such topical, yet timeless content?

     wrote itself

10.13.17  5:15 pm   What are beans?

     i'm not sure

     Are they seeds?

     i'm not sure

     What plants do they come from (like blackbeans or pinto beans or navy beans, etc)?

     i'm not sure

10.13.17  5:04 pm   What are ghost notes? Is that just when you mute the string(s) on guitar/bass?

     it's kind of like the word "the"... it's usually a very small unemphasized word that you just kind of 'ghost' over

10.13.17  4:49 pm   What should I do if someone initiates a handshake but they close their fingers at the last moment so it turns into a fist bump but my hand is still open for a handshake?

     you will probably want to go into therapy together

10.13.17  4:01 pm   Do you think a guitar could reasonably be used for anything else, not involving music?

     yes

10.13.17  3:44 pm   Is there a parallel universe where you are me and I'm you?

     sure

      How does it make you feel?

     fine

10.13.17  3:34 pm   Do you know yourself , Bill?

     i think so

10.13.17  2:33 pm   What's the fifth letter in the title of your new song

     d

10.13.17  2:16 pm   Why won't small children get in my van?

     perhaps they already own a better van

10.13.17  12:58 pm   I love how you made the multiple singing in the choruses of "The World's Got a Problem", will you make it return in the future?

     i'm not sure what you mean. if you are just talking about vocal harmonies, i do that in every song, and also in every video
